name.japanese: ネコネコの実 モデル:豹
name.romanized: Neko Neko no Mi, Moderu: Reopādo

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a leopard and a leopard-human hybrid. Grants enhanced strength, speed, agility, powerful teeth and jaws, retractable claws, stealth capabilities, and enhanced senses.

users.circumstances: Rob Lucci consumed this fruit at some point before his undercover mission in Water 7. He reveals his transformation ability in silhouette at the end of this episode.

abilityReveals.description: Lucci can transform into a leopard hybrid form, though only shown in silhouette in this episode. The full transformation is revealed in Episode 246.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Lucci begins to transform at the end of the confrontation with the Straw Hats, revealing his Devil Fruit power as a cliffhanger.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to Sea-Prism Stone

strengths.strength: Enhanced physical abilities including strength, speed, and agility
strengths.description: The leopard form grants dramatically increased combat capabilities, making Lucci even more dangerous when combined with his Rokushiki mastery.

strengths.strength: Powerful natural weapons - claws and teeth
strengths.description: The leopard form provides sharp claws and powerful jaws for close combat.
